original_text: for a person sixty years old or more, set the value of a male at fifteen shekels and of a female at ten shekels.
korean_text: 예순 살 이상은 남자면 그 값을 십오 세겔로 하고 여자는 열 세겔로 하라

sentences.original_text: For a person sixty years old or more
set the value of a male at fifteen shekels
and of a female at ten shekels
